subject: Return of Simsonn pro x ultra
description_text:
I would like to return a product purchased from you all and wanted to see
what I need to do the packages have not been opened at all. My wife ordered
the pedals for me and tried contacting you all to cancel the order before
it was shipped attached are those emails and order number. If you could
please let me know the next steps we need to take it would be much
appreciated.

conversations.body_text: Hi Edward Melendez,    I reviewed the previous emails. Your wife placed the order on December 3 and contacted us on December 6. We may not have seen the email in time, and the order had already been shipped from the US warehouse, so it could not be intercepted.  Additionally, since the pedals weigh over 10kg, shipping via FedEx is very expensive. If returned, the round-trip shipping cost would exceed the product’s value, especially the return shipping. Therefore, you might consider reselling the unopened product on a local Canadian platform, which could be faster than waiting for delivery from Canada.

I’m a little confused I am US based would I not be returning it back to
your US warehouse to get the refund.
On Tue, Dec 30, 2025 at 9:48 PM service@simsonn.com

Any update on this?
On Wed, Dec 31, 2025 at 6:17 PM Edward Melendez <melendez.edward01@gmail.com>
wrote:

> I’m a little confused I am US based would I not be returning it back to
> your US warehouse to get the refund.
>
> On Tue, Dec 30, 2025 at 9:48 PM service@simsonn.com

Hi Edward Melendez,    We're sorry to hear about this unfortunate situation, but we generally cannot accept returns for products without defects. Since iron products are prone to scratches and other signs of use, we are typically unable to resell them. If your product is in perfect condition, you may return the package to our US warehouse. We will process your refund after receiving and inspecting the item. However, please ensure the packaging is intact and the product shows no signs of use—otherwise, your return request will not be approved!    MaZon CA Chino 13402 YORBA AVENUE, Unit 102, Chino, CA  91710 USA +1 480-387-3114

I have not opened them from the original packaging at all to even look at
them. So I would like to return them do you have a return label I can send
these back with?

On Thu, Jan 15, 2026 at 5:25 AM service@simsonn.com
Hi Edward Melendez,    We apologize, but you will need to return the item to our warehouse yourself.
